name: Stackers Inc.
description: Developer of internet launchpad software designed to offer an unlimited split-screen view. The company's software increases the efficiency of working with the web for the average internet user by allowing simultaneous use of multiple web applications within a neatly organized working environment as well as unifying notifications, enabling clients to boost productivity and get protection from unwanted threats.
one_liner: Developer of internet launchpad software designed to offer an unlimited split-screen view. The company's software increases the efficiency of working with the web for the average internet user by allowing simultaneous use of multiple web applications within a neatly organized working environment as well as unifying notifications, enabling clients to boost productivity and get protection from unwanted threats.
